Navigation menu on exit
Pressing \"back\" when in notes list opens navigation menu instead of exiting
Text size
Behaviors
Swipe notes
Swipe on notes to perform actions
Swipe to trash
Swiping notes with finger will archive them
Swiping notes with finger will trash them
Group not categorized
Adds a new item in navigation menu for not categorized notes
Note count
Shows the number of associated notes next to the category
Automatic location
Automatically adds location to new notes
Dynamic menu
Unused menu items are automatically hidden
Floating action button
Short touch performs action
Short touch toggles options
Attachments on bottom
Shows attachments below note content
Shows attachments above note content
Prettified dates
Dates are shown in a simplier format
Dates are shown in a more detailed format
Privacy
Error reporting
When app crashes developer will be informed to help you
No crash reports will be sent. Do not complain if something goes wrong!
Share anonymous data
Help the developer by sending non-sensitive data like device model, language, frequently used app\'s features. This data are used only to improve the open-source app.
Statistics
ທ່ານເປີດໃຊ້ງານ Omni Notes ເປັນຄັ້ງທຳອິດ, ທ່ານຕ້ອງການເບິ່ງການແນະນຳແອັບພຼິເຄຊັນບໍ່?
ຍິນດີຕ້ອນຮັບສູ່ Omni Notes!
ກົດ \"ດຳເນີນການ\" ເພື່ອເບິ່ງການແນະນຳແອັບຯ
ການດຳເນີນການ
ສ້າວບັນທຶກໃໝ່, ຈັດລຽງ, ເຂົ້າສູ່ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ
ການຄວບຄຸມ
ເມນູການຄວບຄຸມເຮັດໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດຈັດການບັນທຶກດ້ວຍໂຕຄັດກອງ ແລະ ປ້າຍ
ປ້າຍ
ເພີ່ມປ້າຍສີເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ຄວາມຈື່ຈຳຂອງທ່ານມີປະສິດທິຜົນ
ປັບປຸງ
ເພີ່ມຮຟລ໌ແນບຫຼາກຫຼາຍຮູບແບບໃສ່ບັນທຶກຂອງທ່ານ!
ເຮັດໄດ້ອີກຫຼາຍຢ່າງ
ແບ່ງປັນ, ໃສ່ປ້າຍ, ຈັດເກັບ, ປ້ອງກັນ ແລະ ອື່ນໆ…
ກົດເລີຍ
ການກົດໄລຍະສັ້ນ ຫຼື ຍາວໃສ່ສິ່ງຕ່າງໆ (ໄຟລ໌ແນບ, ສະຖານທີ່, ໂຕເຕືອນຄວາມຈຳ) ມີຜົນໄດ້ຮັບແຕກຕ່າງກັນ!
ລິ້ງ
Click on an URL or e-mail address to copy or open it
Swipe
Create new notes without \n leaving the one you\'re editing
ຈັດເກັບ
ພຽງແຕ່ກົດໄອຄອນຄວບຄຸມ \"ຂຶ້ນ\" ຫຼື ກັບຄືນດ້ວຍປຸ່ມກົດຂອງອຸປະກອນທ່ານ
ຂໍໃຫ້ມີຄວາມສຸກ
Thanks for using Omni Notes \nThe opensource alternative for productivity and leisure note-taking!
